title: Bed Bugs
text: Following a single night stay here, we woke up to find bug bites on our bodies and bed bugs on the mattress. These bugs tend to infest the areas they live in and can easily hide inside luggage or clothes you bring with you. We checked out and asked for a refund, but were denied. After calling the corporate office, they asked us to submit a formal complaint, but still refused to issue a refund.I've submitted complaints to the city health department...but for now, DO NOT STAY AT THIS MOTEL, by any means.
